channel.title: Some questions regarding a 562 server
channel.description:
You do not have to answer every question. They are just general annoyances that are pissing me off :) Feel free to call me names. It makes me smile xD
Q: Whenever I spawn an item, it gives me two of that item. How do I stop this from occurring?
Q: How do you stop the usage of the in-game admin command console?
Q: How do I add objects into the game world? I.E.; Altars at spawn, giant phallus in bank, etc. etc.
Q: How do I make everyone that connects to my server able to spawn? (I have never worked with a 562, so i have no idea :P )
Q: Just what [i]is[/i] the airspeed velocity of an unladen swallow?
This may help others besides me, post some answers for the community and myself as well :) Rep++ for info.

item.title: Some questions regarding a 562 server
item.dc:creator: @M.I.A M.I.A.
item.description:
@M.I.A wrote:

You can do ::item or ::pickup then place the itemid, followed by the ammount. (I.E. ::item/pickup 4151 1)

You can add objects using ObjectManager.java.

You can allow everybody in your server to spawn by simply moving the ::item or ::pickup command into the players section of your commands java file.

Sorry i couldn’t answer your other ones, i hope you find what you’re looking for here.

Have a good one.

Read full topic
